docs.snippet: From swimming to gymnastics, some of the biggest victories for Team USA in Rio have come from its women athletes, and swimmer Maya DiRado says having strong role models has been a key to their success....
docs.lead_paragraph: From swimming to gymnastics, some of the biggest victories for Team USA in Rio have come from its women athletes, and swimmer Maya DiRado says having strong role models has been a key to their success.

headline.main: Swimming: DiRado Says 'Kick-Ass' Role Models Spark U.S. Women
headline.print_headline: Swimming: DiRado Says 'Kick-Ass' Role Models Spark U.S. Women

docs.snippet: The absence of Chinese athletes “shows that the environment isn’t here for sexual minorities to come out yet,” a spokesman for an advocacy group said....
docs.lead_paragraph: The absence of Chinese athletes “shows that the environment isn’t here for sexual minorities to come out yet,” a spokesman for an advocacy group said.

headline.main: More Openly Gay Olympians Than Ever, but No Chinese Among Them

docs.snippet: Olympic security personnel questioned a female Iranian volleyball fan Saturday when she showed up for a match holding a large sign that read "Let Iranian Women Enter Their Stadiums" and wearing a white T-shirt with those same words....
docs.lead_paragraph: Olympic security personnel questioned a female Iranian volleyball fan Saturday when she showed up for a match holding a large sign that read "Let Iranian Women Enter Their Stadiums" and wearing a white T-shirt with those same words.

headline.main: Olympic Security Asks Female Iranian Fan to Drop Sign
headline.print_headline: Olympic Security Asks Female Iranian Fan to Drop Sign

docs.snippet: The 3,600-square-foot sign visible from Fenway Park has been part of the city’s skyline since 1940, and some residents are pushing for it to stay put....
docs.lead_paragraph: The 3,600-square-foot sign visible from Fenway Park has been part of the city’s skyline since 1940, and some residents are pushing for it to stay put.
docs.abstract: Boston University announces it will sell building on which iconic Citgo sign sits to developer Related Beal; preservationists hope sale will mean sign, part of Boston's skyline since 1940, will stay; Boston Landmarks Commission has granted preliminary landmark status to sign.

headline.main: Boston Developer Buys Building With Citgo Sign, Raising Preservation Hopes
headline.print_headline: Boston Building With Citgo Sign Is Sold to a Local Firm

docs.snippet: Leicester City became the first reigning Premier League champions to begin their title defence with a defeat when they were beaten 2-1 at promoted Hull City, who shrugged off an injury crisis to cause an upset on the opening day of the new season ...
docs.lead_paragraph: Leicester City became the first reigning Premier League champions to begin their title defence with a defeat when they were beaten 2-1 at promoted Hull City, who shrugged off an injury crisis to cause an upset on the opening day of the new season on Saturday.

headline.main: Champions Leicester Stunned by Hull in Premier League Opener
headline.print_headline: Champions Leicester Stunned by Hull in Premier League Opener

docs.snippet: Alex Rodriguez was unconditionally released by the New York Yankees on Saturday, ending his 12 years in pinstripes and perhaps his big league career after 22 seasons....

docs.snippet: Leicester City lost only three games in their title-winning campaign last season but their opening 2-1 defeat at Hull City on Saturday was a warning that life could be very different as champions rather than underdogs....
docs.lead_paragraph: Leicester City lost only three games in their title-winning campaign last season but their opening 2-1 defeat at Hull City on Saturday was a warning that life could be very different as champions rather than underdogs.

headline.main: Ranieri Warns of Tougher Season After Opening Day Defeat
headline.print_headline: Ranieri Warns of Tougher Season After Opening Day Defeat
